sentences.sContent: You have only to ask the questions to realise the fatuity of the idea.
sentences.sContent_eng: You have only to ask the questions to realise the fatuity of the idea.
sentences.sCn: 你所问的问题只会了解到当时思想的愚昧。

sentences.sContent: God never puts blame on people's fatuity but people put blame on god of unjust.
sentences.sContent_eng: God never puts blame on people's fatuity but people put blame on god of unjust.
sentences.sCn: 上帝从不埋怨人们的愚昧人们却埋怨上帝的不公。

words.tran: 愚笨的；昏庸的；发呆的；自满的
愚蠢地；自满地（fatuous的副词形式）
